Rebecca Small is a BBC Local Radio producer, currently working for BBC Radio Gloucestershire.

Experience

At BBC Radio Gloucestershire I’ve hosted broadcasts from Barn on The Farm and the Royal International Air Tattoo as well as election specials.

I present travel bulletins on the breakfast programme with Mark Cummings and chat on-air about what’s happening in the local area.

  • 2017 – Now: Producer and presenter at BBC Radio Gloucestershire
  • 2014 - 2017: Station Manager of Tone Radio and Wychwood FM

Achievements

  • 2017: Graduated from the University of Gloucestershire’s Radio (BA, Hons) course
  • 2017: Host of the Student Radio Chart Show
  • 2017 and 2016: UoG Student Union Committee Member of the Year
